description:
[PDF Reader. PDF Control. PDF Component]

PDFNet SDK is the ultimate PDF toolkit.

This package is the full version of PDFTron UWP SDK.

With PDFNet components you can build reliable & speedy applications that can view, create, print, edit, and annotate PDFs ... across operating systems.

Developers use PDFNet SDK to read, write, and edit PDF documents compatible with all published versions of PDF specification (including the latest ISO32000). The extensive PDF library API supports most common use-case scenarios such as:
*        PDF Viewing & Collaboration
*        PDF Rasterization
*        PDF Printing
*        PDF Form filling and flattening
*        PDF Split & Merge
*        PDF Stamping
*        Dynamic PDF generation (e.g. FlowDocument & Xaml to PDF)
*        PDF Text extraction and indexing
*        PDF Packages
*        PDF Layers (OCGs)
*        PDF Editing
*        PDF Encryption
*        Manipulate PDF bookmarks, links, and annotations.
*        PDF Optimization
*        PDF/A Validation and Conversion
*        PDF Redaction
*        PDF Conversion from MS Office, various image formats etc.
releaseNotes:
### New Features

	* Added support to convert xls and ppt office format files to PDF
	* External Annotation Manager that can be used on collab mode
	* Added Ink.SetHighlightIntent and Ink.GetHighlightIntent() which should be used instead of the deprecated Ink.SetBlendMode()
	* Added SetCustomData(), GetCustomData(), and DeleteCustomData() to all Annotations
	* Added SetRequiredFieldBorderColor() to PDFviewCtrl which allows to change the border color of required field on a document
	* Added PDFDoc.RefreshAnnotAppearance() - Generates the appearance stream for annotations in the document
	* Added Annot.RefreshAppearance(RefreshOptions) in order to allow customization of the annotation appearance
	
	### Improvements and Bugfixes
	
	* [pdf] fixed SaveAsync() issue after Undo() is performed
	* [pdf] fixed SaveAsync() issue after Flattening or Reducing a document
	* [pdf] fixed Page.GetAnnot() exception when trying to get a not valid SDF object
	* [pdf] fixed issue when creating dashed annotation border using AnnotBorderStyle
	* [pdf] Added proper exception handling to GetThumbAsync()
	* [pdf] Added SetDateToNow() to all annotations
	* [pdf] Added new overloaded Image.Create() method
	* [pdf] Added ability to create Markup from SDF obj or Annotation
	
	* [Documentation] Added missing API documentation
	* [Documentation] Added managed C++ to API documentation
	* [Resources] Added plugin files to be used when converting Office files to PDF
summary:
PDFNet SDK is the ultimate PDF toolkit.
With PDFNet components you can build reliable & speedy applications that can view, create, print, edit, and annotate PDFs ... across operating systems.
Developers use PDFNet SDK to read, write, and edit PDF documents compatible with all published versions of PDF specification (including the latest ISO32000).
title: PDFTron SDK for UWP
